#summary APIs list

The APIs are sorted by MicroLua's versions:
  * [ApiFourDotSix 4.6]
  * [ApiFourDotFive 4.5]
  * [ApiFourDotTwo 4.2]
  * [ApiFourDotOne 4.1]
  * [ApiFourDotZeroDotOne 4.0.1]
  * [ApiFourDotZero 4.0]
  * [ApiThreeDotOne 3.1]

You can also [ApiIdeas suggest changes in the API], but it's better to do so in the [https://code.google.com/p/microlua/issues/list issues page].
